domains.name: Evaluate, Direct and Monitor
domains.description: Governance objectives covering the evaluation, direction, and monitoring of IT strategy and compliance

objectives.name: Ensured Governance Framework Setting and Maintenance
objectives.description: Analyze and articulate the requirements for the governance of enterprise IT. Put in place and maintain the governance structures, principles, processes, and practices.

objectives.name: Ensured Benefits Delivery
objectives.description: Optimize the value contribution to the business from IT-enabled business processes, services, and assets.

objectives.name: Ensured Risk Optimization
objectives.description: Ensure that enterprise IT-related risk does not exceed the organization's risk appetite and tolerance.

objectives.name: Ensured Resource Optimization
objectives.description: Ensure that adequate and sufficient IT-related capabilities are available to support enterprise objectives.

objectives.name: Ensured Stakeholder Engagement
objectives.description: Ensure that enterprise IT stakeholders are identified, engaged, and that IT performance reporting is transparent.

domains.name: Align, Plan and Organize
domains.description: Management objectives for aligning IT with business strategy, planning, and organizing IT resources

objectives.name: Managed IT Management Framework
objectives.description: Implement a consistent management approach for governance requirements to be met covering processes, structures, roles, and responsibilities.

objectives.name: Managed Strategy
objectives.description: Provide a holistic view of the current IT and business environment, the future direction, and the initiatives required.

objectives.name: Managed Enterprise Architecture
objectives.description: Establish a common architecture covering business process, information, data, application, and technology layers.

objectives.name: Managed Innovation
objectives.description: Maintain an awareness of IT and related service trends, identify innovation opportunities, and plan how to benefit from innovation.

objectives.name: Managed Portfolio
objectives.description: Execute the strategic direction set for investments in line with the enterprise architecture vision.

objectives.name: Managed Budget and Costs
objectives.description: Manage the IT-related financial activities in both the business and IT functions.

objectives.name: Managed Human Resources
objectives.description: Provide a structured approach to ensure optimal sourcing, structuring, rights, and skills of human resources.

objectives.name: Managed Relationships
objectives.description: Manage the relationship between the business and IT in a formalized and transparent manner.

objectives.name: Managed Service Agreements
objectives.description: Align IT-enabled services and service levels with enterprise needs and expectations.

objectives.name: Managed Vendors
objectives.description: Manage IT-related products and services provided by all types of vendors to meet enterprise requirements.

objectives.name: Managed Quality
objectives.description: Define and communicate quality requirements in all processes, procedures, and the related enterprise outcomes.

objectives.name: Managed Risk
objectives.description: Continually identify, assess, and reduce IT-related risk within levels of tolerance set by management.

objectives.name: Managed Security
objectives.description: Define, operate, and monitor an information security management system.

objectives.name: Managed Data
objectives.description: Achieve and maintain effective management of enterprise data assets throughout the data life cycle.

domains.name: Build, Acquire and Implement
domains.description: Management objectives for building, acquiring, and implementing IT solutions

objectives.name: Managed Programs
objectives.description: Manage all programs from the investment portfolio in alignment with enterprise strategy and in a coordinated manner.

objectives.name: Managed Requirements Definition
objectives.description: Identify solutions and analyze requirements before acquisition or creation to ensure alignment with business requirements.

objectives.name: Managed Solutions Identification and Build
objectives.description: Establish and maintain identified solutions in line with enterprise requirements covering design, development, procurement, and partnering.

objectives.name: Managed Availability and Capacity
objectives.description: Balance current and future needs for availability, performance, and capacity with cost-effective service provision.

objectives.name: Managed Organizational Change
objectives.description: Maximize the likelihood of successfully implementing sustainable organizational change.

objectives.name: Managed IT Changes
objectives.description: Manage all changes in a controlled manner, including standard changes and emergency maintenance.

objectives.name: Managed IT Change Acceptance and Transitioning
objectives.description: Formally accept and make operational new solutions, including implementation planning, system and data conversion.

objectives.name: Managed Knowledge
objectives.description: Maintain the availability of relevant, current, validated, and reliable knowledge to support all process activities.

objectives.name: Managed Assets
objectives.description: Manage IT assets through their life cycle to make sure their use delivers value at optimal cost.

objectives.name: Managed Configuration
objectives.description: Define and maintain descriptions and relationships between key resources and capabilities required to deliver IT-enabled services.

domains.name: Deliver, Service and Support
domains.description: Management objectives for delivering, servicing, and supporting IT services

objectives.name: Managed Operations
objectives.description: Coordinate and execute the activities and operational procedures required to deliver IT services.

objectives.name: Managed Service Requests and Incidents
objectives.description: Provide timely and effective response to user requests and resolution of all types of incidents.

objectives.name: Managed Problems
objectives.description: Identify and classify problems and their root causes. Provide timely resolution to prevent recurring incidents.

objectives.name: Managed Continuity
objectives.description: Establish and maintain a plan to enable the business and IT to respond to incidents and disruptions.

objectives.name: Managed Security Services
objectives.description: Protect enterprise information to maintain the level of information security risk acceptable to the enterprise.

objectives.name: Managed Business Process Controls
objectives.description: Define and maintain appropriate business process controls to ensure that information processed satisfies all relevant requirements.

domains.name: Monitor, Evaluate and Assess
domains.description: Management objectives for monitoring, evaluating, and assessing IT performance and compliance

objectives.name: Managed Performance and Conformance Monitoring
objectives.description: Collect, validate, and evaluate business and IT goals and metrics. Monitor that processes are performing against agreed performance and conformance goals.

objectives.name: Managed System of Internal Control
objectives.description: Continuously monitor and evaluate the control environment including self-assessments and independent assurance reviews.

objectives.name: Managed Compliance with External Requirements
objectives.description: Evaluate that IT processes and IT-supported business processes are compliant with laws, regulations, and contractual requirements.

objectives.name: Managed Assurance
objectives.description: Enable the organization to design and develop efficient and effective assurance initiatives.

objectives.name: Managed External Assurance
objectives.description: Obtain independent assurance of the adequacy and effectiveness of the system of internal controls.
